sentence.Network_en: The weather forecast is for showers and overcast skies.
sentence.Network_cn: 天气预报上说多云并伴有阵雨。

sentence.Network_en: To make extra certain, a police helicopter kept watch from the skies.
sentence.Network_cn: 为确保万无一失，一架警用直升机一直在空中警戒。

sentence.Network_en: He searched the skies for enemy bombers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在空中搜寻敌军轰炸机。

entry.def: The sky is the space around the earth which you can see when you stand outside and look upwards.

example.ex: The sun is already high in the sky.

example.tran: 温暖的阳光和蔚蓝的晴空

Sentence.sentence: More than paradise lost, a perishing rain forest could trigger a domino effect - sending winds and rains kilometers off course and loading the skies with even greater levels of greenhouse gases - that will be felt far beyond the Amazon basin.
